extensionDescription.message: Copies either a link's text and location or the page's title and location to the clipboard from the context menu. Heavily inspired by the CoLT add-on.

copyLinkLocationString.message: Copy link text and location as
copyLinkLocationString.description: Translation of 'Copy link text and location as'

copyPageLocationString.message: Copy page title and location as
copyPageLocationString.description: Translation of 'Copy page title and location as'
